channel.title: Objects
channel.description:
(Project 16) Ok I know how to use ::object ... to spawn objects, i also know how to keep them there by adding them to the WorldObjects.cfg I dont want it to lag because every 500ms it does the add world object command, Which is in the process().
Where else could i put this command so that the objects show up, but doesnt show up every 500ms?
If this is confusing i couldt think of how to word it.. lol

item.title: Objects
item.dc:creator: @Striker10777 Striker10777
